casebody.data:
ACTS RETIREMENT-LIFE COMMUNITIES, INC.
v.
TOWN OF COLUMBUS 334PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 19, 2017 *146Ryan D. Bolick, Attorney at Law, Virginia M. Wooten, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Town of Columbus, North Carolina. Benjamin R. Sullivan, Jr., Attorney at Law, Charles C. Meeker, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for ACTS Retirement-Life Communities, Inc.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th of December 2017 by Plaintiff for Substitution of Counsel:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 19th of December 2017."
